Original Title : The Returned
Year: 2013
Length: 98 min .
Country: Spain
Directed: Manuel Carballo
Screenplay: Hatem Khraiche
Music: Jonathan Goldsmith
Photo: Javier Salmon
Starring: Emily Hampshire, Kris Holden-Ried, Shawn Doyle, Claudia Bassols, Emily Alatalo, Paulino Nunes, Melina Matthews, Jamie Lyle, Stephen Chambers
Production: Co-Spain-Canada; Castelao Pictures/Ramaco Media
Genre: Thriller. Terror. Science Fiction | Zombies . disease
Official Website: http://www.filmaxinternational.com/film.php?id=70

Synopsis:
---------
Humanity lives with the "returnees", apparently normal people who have been infected by a devastating virus. Only the daily injection of a protein prevents them from becoming zombies. Kate works in a research unit urgently trying to find a definitive vaccine to prevent the epidemic from spreading. Furthermore, moves a powerful sentimental reason: her boyfriend Alex is a" returned ".When the government announced the shortage of protein and the cessation of studies , the infected are hospitalized at a military high security.Fearing the worst, Kate and Alex decide to flee.
